post.summary: Endpoint to get list of all gp users who connected in requested time range, with all their details

application_score.description: Average Application score for the user/device

post.summary: Endpoint to get number of licences consumed for mobile users. For GP, EP and aggregate

gp_user_count.description: Number of GP users active in last 90 days

ep_user_count.description: Number of Explicit Proxy users active in last 90 days

rbi_user_count.description: Number of Next Hop Proxy users active in last 90 days

aggregate_user_count.description: Number of mobile users active in last 90 days after de-duplicating across GP and EP users

post.summary: Endpoint to get list of all mobile users who were active in last 90 day. This will include both GP and Explicit Proxy Users

user_name.description: user name for the mobile user

last_login_time.description: epoch login timestamp for the user's latest session. In Milliseconds.

pa_location.description: PA location for the latest activity/session

connection_method.description: The latest connection method for the user - ep/gp

client_private_address.description: user ip address assigned by fw/gw
